urlencoded.value: How can I download the fee receipt?
Once the fee is paid and processed succesfully you can download the fee receipt by going to paid fees section and clicking the download icon
Fee amount in fee booklet does not match fee amount
Fee amount in fee booklet does not match fee amount for term 1 class 2 academic fee.
